        public Command getCommand(java.lang.String commandName)
        Get the command object by it's name or an alias.
        Parameters:
        commandName - The name or alias for a command.
        Returns:

      • getCommands

        public java.util.List<Command> getCommands(CommandLevel level)
        Get the Command objects that are associated with a specific CommandLevel.
        Parameters:
        level - The CommandLevel of the Command objects to be returned.
        Returns:
        The Command objects that match the specified CommandLevel, null if none were found.
